function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Rapid diagnosis and risk prediction of covid-19 through ai and machine learning algorithms","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of cloud-based ai-assisted ct service for detecting covid-19 pneumonia","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global availability of open-source deep convolutional neural network design for detecting covid-19 cases","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with quarantine and isolation measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate reporting of symptoms in self-reported surveys","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of digital technology for quarantine and self-isolation monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai-powered surveillance for monitoring and restricting public gatherings","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforcement of quarantine with tracking devices and fines","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential privacy concerns with the collection and storage of personal health data through mobile applications.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of missed exposure and contact tracing due to the absence of mobile phones or mobile service.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low adoption rates of contact tracing applications leading to reduced effectiveness of the mitigation strategy.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of widespread testing and screening technologies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of digital systems for screening vital signs and self-reporting of symptoms","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy and surveillance concerns with aggressive contact tracing","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ai predictive models trained on chinese samples may not be generalizable to other populations.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Noise from social media and online traffic may lead to overfitted ai models and inaccurate trend predictions.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate screening and testing strategies in some countries may result in underreporting of covid-19 cases and transmission rates.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of big data and ai for tracking people and infection spread","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of mobile phones and social media for real-time data collection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Real-time data reporting and sharing within healthcare organizations","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High transmissibility of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Varied success in managing the burden of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective pandemic management despite preparedness","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in wastewater treatment plant wwtp inflow","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unspecific signal in rt-qpcr testing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor removal of sars-cov-2 in conventional activated-sludge wwtp","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete reduction of viral load in wastewater treatment systems","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of gene fragments in effluents","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unlikely infectivity and replication-competence of released viral particles","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large emission of sars-cov-2 gene equivalents into receiving water bodies from wastewater treatment plants wwtps .","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in viral shedding from infected persons and uncertainty in viral gene copies detected in human excreta.","category":"Health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variations in virus rna recovery affecting correlations","category":"Health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in estimated prevalence data","category":"Health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in wastewater composition affecting bioindicator utilization","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection limit of the method not optimized for lower incidence levels","category":"Technical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in catchment area sizes and wastewater flow","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlation between measured sars-cov-2 load and estimated covid-19 cases","category":"Health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Optimization of pcr conditions may result in false-positive results.","category":"Technical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Accumulation of extraneous nucleic acids during the concentration process of wastewater samples.","category":"Technical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Untested retention of wastewater samples before the sars-cov-2 pandemic as control.","category":"Technical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible cross contamination during the purification or rna isolation step","category":"Technical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unspecific signal in rt-qpcr due to environmental contaminants","category":"Technical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential false-positive results due to environmental contaminants affecting pcr","category":"Technical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of pcr targeting sars-cov-2 rdrp and m-gene in wastewater analysis.","category":"Technical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Viral outgrowth assay using caco-2 cells for detecting sars-cov-2 infection in wastewater samples.","category":"Technical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison of rt-qpcr primer and probe efficiency for detecting sars-cov-2 genes in wastewater.","category":"Technical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Analysis of bioindicators in wastewater to estimate population can lead to inaccurate assessments and decision-making.","category":"Technical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Testing sample materials during a pandemic carries the risk of incomplete or inaccurate detection of contagious viruses such as sars-cov-2.","category":"Technical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on pcr assays targeting specific genes for sars-cov-2 detection in wastewater may result in limited virus detection and surveillance.","category":"Technical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher gene equivalent concentrations in the effluent than the influent due to repartitioning of gene material during wastewater treatment.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
